## Indeterminate progress

```jsx
<LoadingBar />
```

## Determinate progress

```jsx
<LoadingBar value={0} />
<LoadingBar value={.25} />
<LoadingBar value={.5} />
<LoadingBar value={.75} />
<LoadingBar value={1} />
```

## File loading progress

```jsx
  class LoadingExample extends React.Component {
    constructor () {
      super()
      this.state = {
        max: null,
        value: 0
      }
      this.request = this.request.bind(this)
    }

    request () {
      const xhr = new XMLHttpRequest()
      xhr.onloadstart = () => this.setState({ value: null })
      xhr.onprogress = evt => {
        if (!evt.lengthComputable) { return }
        this.setState({ max: evt.total, value: evt.loaded })
      }
      xhr.open('GET', 'https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/6/6f/CMB_Timeline300_no_WMAP.jpg')
      xhr.send()
    }

    render () {
      return <>
        <LoadingBar value={this.state.value} max={this.state.max} />

        <p><Button onClick={this.request}>Load (994kB)</Button></p>
      </>
    }
  }

  render(<LoadingExample />)
```
